forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. North northwest wind 5 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a canopy of shimmering sunlight, casting a warm glow over the city. With temperatures gracefully hovering near 60, you may notice a gentle breeze from the west, rustling leaves and whispering through the streets. The skies appear clear, revealing the iconic outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge and the city skyline in crisp clarity, unhindered by fog or marine layer – at least for now. The vibrant scene invites an appreciation of the views and the somewhat serene pace of the day.

As evening approaches, the air will cool, slipping to around 47 degrees, shifting to a slightly more brisk ambiance. A north-northwest wind will continue to dance gently, reminding locals that layers can be your allies this time of year. As the sun begins its descent, consider taking a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or through one of the city’s many parks. A quiet café may also offer refuge to enjoy a warm drink while gazing at the fading light over the bay. It’s a fine day to breathe in the city, allowing its unique rhythms to blend into your own.
